required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of a New HIV Prevention Intervention for Black Bisexually-active Men
clinical_study.official_title: Development and Testing of HIV Prevention Interventions Targeting Black MSM/W

collaborator.agency: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

arm_group.description: 6 2-hour counseling session with trained therapist/counselor. The sessions deal with coping and stress reduction as well as sexual health.
One 60-minute counseling session, based on standard HIV counseling content.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- male and female sex partners past 12 months
